messages.content:
For each message I give, generate questions based on the topic Fortnite, and give out four possible answers, one of which must be right and the other three must be wrong.
Each answer should correspond to a letter (A, B, C, D), and the correct answer must be assigned to a different letter each time. Absolutely do not give me the right answer.
Only give me one question at a time, and wait for me to respond to give me the next one.
Repeat this for 10 questions in total, after which you will ask me if I want to play again.
Increase the difficulty of the questions as I respond correctly.

Question 1: What type of game is Fortnite?

A) First-person shooter 
B) Sports
C) Puzzle game
D) Racing

Question 2: What is the main objective of Fortnite?

A) Collecting resources 
B) Surviving 
C) Building a city 
D) Killing animals

Question 3: What mode allows players to team up and survive together in Fortnite?

A) Creative mode 
B) Battle Royale mode 
C) Save the World mode 
D) Playground mode
